summary.para: The Reserve method reserves or unreserves a device resource.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: Flag indicating whether to reserve or unreserve this device. The value must be a member of the enumeration.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if the device was successfully reserved or unreserved, S_FALSE if the device is currently reserved and will continue to be held, or an HRESULT error code if the device can't be reserved.

remarks.para: A resource can be reserved multiple times. If the method returns S_OK, the filter increments an internal reserve count. For every call to reserve a device that returns S_OK, the caller must make a matching call to unreserve the device.
